$description: | What does this do? | Configures restrictions for creating Azure AD Groups. The baseline restricts users not in "Baseline - Group Creators" from creating groups. | | Why should you use this? | If you want to tighten security around group creation. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. User who are not in "Baseline - Group Creators" will not be allowed to create Azure AD groups. | | Learn more | [Manage who can create Microsoft 365 Groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/solutions/manage-creation-of-groups?view=o365-worldwide) |
